index.title: VA.gov Design System
index.description: The VA.gov Design System provides building blocks for teams to create consistent, accessible, and user-centered products for Veterans and their families.

patterns/ask-users-for/a-mutually-exclus.title: A mutually exclusive answer
patterns/ask-users-for/a-mutually-exclus.description: Follow this pattern when users may need to select either none or all available options.

patterns/ask-users-for/a-single-response.title: A single response
patterns/ask-users-for/a-single-response.description: Follow this pattern to collect one logical piece of information at a time, allowing users to focus on specific questions.

patterns/ask-users-for/addresses/index.title: Addresses
patterns/ask-users-for/addresses/index.description: Follow this pattern to collect mailing or home addresses from users.

patterns/ask-users-for/contact-preferenc.title: Contact preferences
patterns/ask-users-for/contact-preferenc.description: Follow this pattern to ask users how they'd like to be contacted.

patterns/ask-users-for/dates/index.title: Dates
patterns/ask-users-for/dates/index.description: Follow this pattern to ask users for dates including birth dates, service dates, and date ranges.

patterns/ask-users-for/direct-deposit/in.title: Direct deposit
patterns/ask-users-for/direct-deposit/in.description: Follow this pattern to collect banking information for Veterans to receive electronic payments.

patterns/ask-users-for/email-address/ind.title: Email address
patterns/ask-users-for/email-address/ind.description: Follow this pattern to collect email addresses from users for forms and communications.

patterns/ask-users-for/feedback/index.title: Feedback
patterns/ask-users-for/feedback/index.description: Follow this pattern to ask users for feedback via the Medallia feedback button and form.

patterns/ask-users-for/files/index.title: Files
patterns/ask-users-for/files/index.description: Follow this pattern to help users upload files and provide required documentation.

patterns/ask-users-for/housing-status/in.title: Housing status
patterns/ask-users-for/housing-status/in.description: Follow this pattern to ask Veterans about their current housing situation in a trauma-informed way.

patterns/ask-users-for/index.title: Ask users for...
patterns/ask-users-for/index.description: Patterns for collecting user information including addresses, dates, names, contact information, and more.

patterns/ask-users-for/marital-informati.title: Marital information
patterns/ask-users-for/marital-informati.description: Follow this pattern to collect marital status and marriage history using a trauma-informed approach.

patterns/ask-users-for/multiple-response.title: Multiple responses
patterns/ask-users-for/multiple-response.description: Follow this pattern to collect multiple responses from users when the same information needs to be gathered repeatedly.

patterns/ask-users-for/names/index.title: Names
patterns/ask-users-for/names/index.description: Follow this pattern to ask users for their name.

patterns/ask-users-for/phone-numbers/ind.title: Phone numbers
patterns/ask-users-for/phone-numbers/ind.description: Follow this pattern to collect phone numbers from users, supporting both domestic and international formats.

patterns/ask-users-for/race-and-ethnicit.title: Race and ethnicity
patterns/ask-users-for/race-and-ethnicit.description: Follow this pattern when collecting race and ethnicity information from Veterans.

patterns/ask-users-for/relationship/inde.title: Relationship to Veteran
patterns/ask-users-for/relationship/inde.description: Follow this pattern to collect information about a user's relationship to a Veteran.

patterns/ask-users-for/service-history/i.title: Service history
patterns/ask-users-for/service-history/i.description: Follow this pattern to ask users about their military service history and periods of service.

patterns/ask-users-for/signature/index.title: Signature
patterns/ask-users-for/signature/index.description: Follow this pattern to capture digital signatures when forms require users to certify information.

patterns/ask-users-for/social-security-n.title: Social Security or VA file number
patterns/ask-users-for/social-security-n.description: Follow this pattern to collect or display a person's Social Security Number or VA file number.

patterns/deprecated/gender-identity/inde.title: Gender identity
patterns/deprecated/gender-identity/inde.description: This deprecated pattern guided design for collecting gender identity information from Veterans.

patterns/deprecated/know-how-their-infor.title: Know how their information is updated
patterns/deprecated/know-how-their-infor.description: This deprecated pattern guided design teams in helping users understand when and how their personal information will be updated.

patterns/deprecated/pronouns/index.title: Pronouns
patterns/deprecated/pronouns/index.description: This deprecated pattern was designed to ask Veterans for their pronouns in order to address them appropriately.

patterns/deprecated/wizard/index.title: Wizard
patterns/deprecated/wizard/index.description: This deprecated pattern was designed to guide users through complex VA benefit eligibility pathways with a series of questions.

patterns/help-users-to/check-answers/ind.title: Check answers
patterns/help-users-to/check-answers/ind.description: Follow this pattern to help users verify their responses before submitting a form.

patterns/help-users-to/check-eligibility.title: Check eligibility
patterns/help-users-to/check-eligibility.description: Follow this pattern to help users understand their eligibility for benefits or services.

patterns/help-users-to/check-personal-in.title: Check personal information
patterns/help-users-to/check-personal-in.description: Follow this pattern to help users quickly see a list of items related to their personal information.

patterns/help-users-to/complete-a-sub-ta.title: Complete a sub task
patterns/help-users-to/complete-a-sub-ta.description: Follow this pattern to help users complete a shorter task within a larger process.

patterns/help-users-to/index.title: Help users to...
patterns/help-users-to/index.description: Patterns for guiding user interactions including checking eligibility, navigating applications, and recovering from errors.

patterns/help-users-to/keep-a-record-of-.title: Keep a record of submitted information
patterns/help-users-to/keep-a-record-of-.description: Follow this pattern to provide users with a printable record of their form submission.

patterns/help-users-to/know-when-their-i.title: Know when their information is prefilled
patterns/help-users-to/know-when-their-i.description: Follow this pattern to help users understand when their information is automatically populated.

patterns/help-users-to/manage-benefits-a.title: Manage benefits and tools
patterns/help-users-to/manage-benefits-a.description: Follow this pattern to help users manage their benefits and tools through a structured list interface.

patterns/help-users-to/navigate-a-long-l.title: Navigate a long list
patterns/help-users-to/navigate-a-long-l.description: Follow this pattern to allow users to navigate and process a long list by progressively displaying additional items.

patterns/help-users-to/navigate-benefit-.title: Navigate benefit applications
patterns/help-users-to/navigate-benefit-.description: Follow this pattern to help users navigate complex benefit applications through structured phases.

patterns/help-users-to/navigate-multiple.title: Navigate multiple related forms
patterns/help-users-to/navigate-multiple.description: Follow this pattern to help Veterans understand which forms come next and how to move through multiple forms without confusion.

patterns/help-users-to/recover-from-erro.title: Recover from errors
patterns/help-users-to/recover-from-erro.description: Follow this pattern to help users understand and recover from system-level errors.

patterns/help-users-to/sign-in/index.title: Sign in
patterns/help-users-to/sign-in/index.description: Follow this pattern to help users sign into VA online services and access verified accounts.

patterns/help-users-to/stay-informed-of-.title: Stay informed of their form submission status
patterns/help-users-to/stay-informed-of-.description: Follow this pattern to notify users about form submission progress and status.

patterns/help-users-to/update-prefilled-.title: Update prefilled information
patterns/help-users-to/update-prefilled-.description: Follow this pattern to help users modify information that has been automatically filled into forms.

patterns/index.title: Patterns
patterns/index.description: Patterns incorporate one or more page layouts and components to create interactions that can span multiple pages.

story-embed-test.title: StoryEmbed Component Test
story-embed-test.description: Testing the updated StoryEmbed component with working iframe fixes

templates/email/index.title: Email
templates/email/index.description: Design resource for communicating with Veterans through transactional and informational emails.

templates/forms/accessibility-guidelines.title: Accessibility guidelines for forms
templates/forms/accessibility-guidelines.description: Detailed accessibility requirements and implementation guidance for forms on VA.gov.

templates/forms/confirmation/index.title: Confirmation
templates/forms/confirmation/index.description: Template providing users with essential information following successful form submission.

templates/forms/form-step-minimal/index.title: Form step - Minimal
templates/forms/form-step-minimal/index.description: A simplified form step template with reduced header/footer to minimize cognitive load.

templates/forms/form-step/index.title: Form step
templates/forms/form-step/index.description: A standardized template for creating form pages where Veterans enter information, select options, or upload documents.

templates/forms/how-to-apply/index.title: How to apply
templates/forms/how-to-apply/index.description: A landing page template that outlines eligibility requirements and provides application instructions.

templates/forms/index.title: Forms overview
templates/forms/index.description: Templates and patterns for creating accessible, Veteran-centered forms on VA.gov.

templates/forms/introduction/index.title: Introduction
templates/forms/introduction/index.description: The form introduction page introduces the process veterans will follow to apply for benefits.

templates/forms/review/index.title: Review
templates/forms/review/index.description: Template for users to examine submitted information and make revisions before final submission.

templates/homepage/index.title: Homepage
templates/homepage/index.description: The primary landing page for VA.gov providing an overview of VA offerings for Veterans and families.

templates/hub/index.title: Hub
templates/hub/index.description: A landing page template for benefit categories providing overviews, navigation, and contact information.

templates/index.title: Templates
templates/index.description: Page-level design examples and layouts for VA.gov

templates/search-results/index.title: Search results
templates/search-results/index.description: Template for displaying pages containing links to content that matched a user's search query.

templates/signed-out-vs-signed-in/index.title: Signed out vs. signed in
templates/signed-out-vs-signed-in/index.description: Template addressing how VA.gov displays different content based on user authentication status.
